reactor.io.buffer

Class BufferAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.io.buffer.BufferAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Allocator<Buffer>

    public class BufferAllocator
extends Object
implements Allocator<Buffer>
    An Allocator implementation that allocates Buffers.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferAllocator()
      Create a BufferAllocator of size=256, direct=false, and bufferSize=Buffer.SMALL_BUFFER_SIZE.

      Create a BufferAllocator.

      • BufferAllocator

        public BufferAllocator()

      • BufferAllocator

        public BufferAllocator(int poolSize,
                       boolean direct,
                       int bufferSize)
        Create a BufferAllocator.
        Parameters:
        poolSize - The number of Buffers to keep on hand.
        direct - Whether or not to use direct buffers.
        bufferSize - The size of the buffers.
